name: PHASEPushStreamBufferOptions
desc: Options that inform PHASE of an audio-stream buffer's playback priority.

items.name: init(rawValue: UInt)
items.desc: Creates a push stream buffer option with the given raw value.

items.name: static var `default`: PHASEPushStreamBufferOptions
items.desc: Indicates a buffer processes after existing buffers in the queue.

items.name: static var interrupts: PHASEPushStreamBufferOptions
items.desc: Indicates a buffer begins processing immediately.

items.name: static var interruptsAtLoop: PHASEPushStreamBufferOptions
items.desc: Indicates a buffer begins processing when an existing buffer loops.

items.name: static var loops: PHASEPushStreamBufferOptions
items.desc: Indicates a buffer restarts after it finishes processing.
